name: reinvigoration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of making something stronger, more exciting, or successful again: They played a huge part in the reinvigoration of popular music in the 1960s. The appointment of a new coach has brought about a re-invigoration of her tennis career. Related word
reinvigorate
More examplesFewer examplesThe industry requires continual reinvigoration. The firm is in the early stages of an ambitious reinvigoration programme.The reinvigoration of the town centre should have a positive effect on the local community.
